lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The dollar ended with modest net losses against most major currencies as the market conducted a final round of position-squaring ahead of tomorrow's crucial Group of Five and Group of Seven meetings, dealers said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The dollar's recent tumble to a 40-year low of 144.70 yen was linked to the market's perception that Washington was unhappy with the rate of adjustment of world trade imbalances and that a continued orderly dollar decline was the least disruptive way of accelerating the process.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: According to figures provided by Morgan Guaranty Trust Co, the dollar's trade-weighted value at midday was 5.7 pct below average market rates in 1980-82, compared with 5.5 pct yesterday.
